title: Customer Management Module
goal: Implement a comprehensive customer management module including data persistence, core logic, and UI integration.

track.name: Customer Management
track.goal: Enable the application to manage customer records, including contact details and interaction history.

tasks.title: Define Customer and Contact Structures
tasks.intent: Define the data structures for customers, including names, addresses, and contact information.

definition_of_done.path: Customer Management/01_Data_Layer/Define Customer and Contact Structures.md

tasks.title: Implement Customer Persistence Logic
tasks.intent: Develop the logic for saving, loading, and deleting customer records from the data store.

tasks.title: Develop Customer Management Service
tasks.intent: Implement the business logic for managing customers, such as search, validation, and categorization.

tasks.title: Create Customer Management GUI
tasks.intent: Design and build the user interface for viewing, adding, and editing customer records.

tasks.title: Integrate Customer Module into Main Menu
tasks.intent: Add navigation entries and access points for the customer management module in the main application window.

definition_of_done.path: Customer Management/03_UI_Integration/Integrate Customer Module into Main Menu.md

tasks.title: Build and Verify Customer System
tasks.intent: Perform a full build and verify the end-to-end functionality of the customer management system.

definition_of_done.path: Customer Management/03_UI_Integration/Build and Verify Customer System.md
